ygData.subject: Re: Testament of Vanear - SPOILER!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa!  What an amazing thing this is.  I did not know that.  Well, I m stuck on wisp isle right now.  So, I ll have to go to Erudia anyway. ... But thanks for
ygData.messageBody:
Whoa! What an amazing thing this is. I did not know that. Well, I'm
stuck on wisp isle right now. So, I'll have to go to Erudia anyway.
:)
But thanks for the tip. I will try that. Hmm, hey I can gate back!


>From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Testament of Vanear - SPOILER!!
>Date: Wed, 13 Oct 1999 22:55:18 +0100
>
>Being a Dark Elf Cleric, and one that has the Testament of Vanear I can
>tell you you don't need to do half of what you have written.
>
>To get the book just give Moodoro Finharn 2gp. He gives you the book..
>then do the 4gp gamble thing to get the jester card. Then give jester
>card to Moodoro to get page. Then go to HP and kill Dynil and get the
>other page. Stick both pages in book and hit combine. No need to go to
>Erudin at all..
>
>You will need to not be KOS in Qeynos and HP of course but that is
>reasonably easy to achieve and you should be aiming for it anyway in my
>opinion since DEs have so much hassle selling/banking as it is.
>
>Vinamin
>Son of Innoruuk
>Priest of The Lady
>Erollisi Marr
